metadata.title: The Real Way Burritos Are Made in Mexico
metadata.description:
Here's a cold hard fact: Mexican burritos are nothing like the ones from Chipotle or Taco Bell here in the USA. Today, with the almighty Chef Jonathan Zaragoza, we‚Äôre diving into 5 popular, regional burritos from Mexico‚Äîmaking them, tasting them, and crowning our favorites. Strap on your burrito bib as we unearth the real story behind the burrito. ü§òüèº Adam

Check out Jonathan‚Äôs Chan: https://www.youtube.com/@goatboyintl

Peep Jonathan and I eat all the Tacos in Chicago: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6xX-vXlKKW8&t=137s&ab_channel=AdamWitt

Get All The Recipes Here: https://www.adamwitt.co/allrecipes/z68a5tgnm8njf6j-hfxcw-gz2p4-b3geg-k3bmn-36ywb-hnn2w-cmjp7-msb9w-jega5-wyfy4-sgmdf-4ggt2-n2ts6-lzssf-ptgwm-3484g-9e98t-wgsf2

CONTRIBUTE TO THE GROCERY FUND! (Patreon): https://www.patreon.com/adamwitt
FOLLOW ALONG ON SOCIAL: https://www.adamwitt.co/social-links
DISCORD:  https://discord.com/invite/aFQ4h4BXg4

Deli Containers: https://amzn.to/49QO635

My Induction Burner: https://amzn.to/4dfhJNE
________________________________________________________ 
TIMESTAMPS‚Ä¶ 
(0:00) Intro
(0:52) Flour Tortillas
(4:42) Bean & Cheese Burrito
(7:03) Northern Burrito
(9:55) Sonoran Burrito
(12:57) Dried Beef Burrito
(14:45) Pork Stew Burrito
(16:54) Taste Test
(22:07) Our Favorites
(23:31) Thanks for Watching!
________________________________________________________ 
#burrito #mexicanfood #authentic #adamwitt #jonathanzaragoza #food #cooking #tortilla

core_summary.core_concepts: This video explores the authentic preparation of Mexican burritos, differentiating them from American versions by showcasing various regional styles.
key_insights: Burritos in Mexico are vastly different from those served in US chains.
The video includes a step-by-step making process of five distinct types of burritos.

recipes.name: Burritos
tips: Use fresh ingredients for the best flavor.
Adjust seasoning according to regional styles.

preparation_tips: Practice tortilla making for better texture.
Taste test each burrito for flavor balance.
cooking_notes.storage_info: Store leftover burritos in airtight containers.
